Verses: 1 yoseppin Kumaaranudaiya Vamsaththaaril Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerukkup Pirandha Keeleyaaththin Vamsa Pidhaakkalaana Thalaivar Serndhu, Mosekkum Isravel Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalil Thalaivaraagiya Prabukkalukkum Munbaagavandhu, Avargalai Nokki:

2 seettuppottu, Dhesaththai Isravel Puththirarukku Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkumpadi Engal Aandavanukkuk Karththar Kattalaiyittaare; Andriyum, Engal Sagodharanaagiya Seloppiyaaththin Sudhandharaththai Avan Kumaaraththigalukkuk Kodukkavendum Endrum Engal Aandavanukkuk Karththaraale Kattalaiyidappattadhe.

3 ippadiyirukka, Ivargal Isravel Puththirarudaiya Veroru Koththiraththin Puththirarukku Manaivigalaanaal, Andhak Kumaaraththigaludaiya Sudhandharam Engal Pidhaakkaludaiya Sudhandharaththilirundhu Neengi, Avargal Utpadugira Koththiraththin Sudhandharaththode Serndhupogum; Ippadi Engal Sudhandharaththukku Seettinaal Vizhundha Pangil Iraamal Atruppogume.

4 isravel Puththirarukku Yoopili Varusham Vandhaalum, Avargaludaiya Sudhandharam Avargal Utpattuppona Koththiraththin Sudhandharaththode Serndhupogum; Ippadi Engal Pidhaakkaludaiya Koththiraththin Sudhandharaththilirundhu Adhu Neengippogume Endraargal.
5 appozhudhu Mose Karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Yoseppu Puththirarin Koththiraththaar Sollugiradhu Sariye.

6 karththar Seloppiyaaththin Kumaaraththigalaik Kuriththa Kaariyaththil Kattalaiyidugiradhaavadhu: Avargal Thangalukku Ishtamaanavargalai Vivaagancheyyalaam; Aanaalum, Thangal Pidhaavin Koththiravamsaththaaril Maaththiram Avargal Vivaagancheyyavendum.

7 ippadiye Isravel Puththirarin Sudhandharam Oru Koththiraththaivittu, Veru Koththiraththukkup Pogaadhirukkum; Isravel Puththirar Avaravar Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Koththiraththin Sudhandharaththile Nilaikondirukkavendum.

8 isravel Puththirar Avaravar Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Sudhandharaththai Anupavikkumpadi, Isravel Puththirarudaiya Oru Koththiraththile Sudhandharam Adaindhirukkira Endhak Kumaaraththiyum Than Pidhaavin Koththira Vamsaththaaril Oruvanukku Manaiviyaagavendum.

9 sudhandharamaanadhu Oru Koththiraththaivittu Veroru Koththiraththai Serak Koodaadhu; Isravel Puththirarudaiya Ovvoru Koththiramum Thanthan Sudhandharaththile Nilaikondirukkavendumendru Kattalaiyittirukkiraar Endraan.
10 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Seloppiyaaththin Kumaaraththigal Seydhaargal.

11 seloppiyaaththin Kumaaraththigalaagiya Maklaal Thirsaal Oklaal Milkaal Novaal Enbavargal Thangal Pidhaavin Sagodhararudaiya Puththirarai Vivaagampanninaargal; Avargal Yoseppin Kumaaranaagiya Manaase Puththirarin Vamsaththaarai Vivaagampanninapadiyaal,
12 avargaludaiya Sudhandharam Avargal Pidhaavin Vamsamaana Koththiraththode Irundhadhu.
13 erigovin Aruge Yordhaanukku Ippuraththilulla Movaapin Samanaana Veligalil Karththar Moseyaikkondu Isravel Puththirarukku Vidhiththa Kattalaigalum Nyaayangalum Ivaigale.
